channel.title: Disappearing Overhead Prayers
channel.description:
I'm currently editing GoogleScape client v1 (and server source), and came across this problem
Overhead prayers work, but as soon as I attack something, they disappear!
Before I attack: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img398.imageshack.us/img398/918/beforelv9.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=398&i=beforelv9.png][IMG]http://img398.imageshack.us/img398/918/beforelv9.6b2d204871.jpg[/img][/URL]
After I attack: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/8896/aftertw5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=177&i=aftertw5.png][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/8896/aftertw5.64a185f087.jpg[/img][/URL]
This happened with ALL overhead prayers on ALL npc's that I attacked.
I used Xxnubxx's guide to adding 80% working prayer; located here: <http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=54382> (Replace Google with Rune-server)
So my question is: Is there any way to keep my overhead prayers from disappearing when I attack?

item.title: Disappearing Overhead Prayers
item.dc:creator: @cannoli cannoli
item.description:
@cannoli wrote:

im not sure what i should change, or what to look for

Read full topic

item.title: Disappearing Overhead Prayers
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

they are called head Icons. Skull Icons for skulls. You should look at attacking npc methods & player rendering update blocks.

Read full topic

item.title: Disappearing Overhead Prayers
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Then use the new V2. That’s just a problem with something I don’t know about. I’m into servers not clients.

Read full topic
